actions.name: Shocking Grasp (Cantrip)
entries: {@atk ms} +8 to hit (with advantage if the target is wearing armor made of metal), reach 5 ft., one creature. 13 (3d8 damage) lightning damage, and the target can't take reactions until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Fireball (3rd-Level Spell; 3/Day)
entries: The sage creates a fiery explosion centered on a point it can see within 150 feet of it. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 (8d6 damage) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The fire spreads around corners and ignites flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried.
